# Class NER

Class for Named Entity Recognition (NER). Provides functionality to detect and extract named entities from text.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy extractEntities

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this NER instance.

#### Returns void




### extractEntities

  * extractEntities(text: string): Promise<[EntityMatch](./primitives_ner_entity_match.EntityMatch)[]>

Extracts entities from the provided text.

#### Parameters

    * text: string

Text to analyze for entities

#### Returns Promise<[EntityMatch](./primitives_ner_entity_match.EntityMatch)[]>

Promise resolving to an array of entity matches

#### Throws

InworldError if NER is not initialized or extraction fails

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
